tutorials.title: Database Cloud Services Workshop for OCI Lab Introduction
Lab 1: Introduction and Setup
tutorials.description: Create services and setup account for workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Cloud Migration
tutorials.description: Explore some common use cases for moving your data from on-premise to the cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 3: DBCS Maintenance
tutorials.description: Perform some common DBA tasks such as setting up security access and scaling out your instance

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Using the Oracle Command Line Interface (CLI) to manage DBCS Instances
tutorials.description: Configure Oracle CLI and perform various DBA tasks with CLI
